testSchema: create table t1(a int, b int)
create table t2(x int, y int)

testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list in case with only from and select-list

testCases.testQuery: select b+1 from vs.t1 where t1.b>7
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list and WHERE-clause

testCases.testQuery: select b+1 from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list, join and WHERE-clause

Exasol: SELECT ("T1"."B" + 1) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B"

testCases.testQuery: select b+1 from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7 order by t2.y limit 3 offset 1
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list, join and WHERE-clause, ORDER BY and LIMIT

Exasol: SELECT ("T1"."B" + 1) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B" ORDER BY "T2"."Y" LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1

testCases.testQuery: select sum(b+1) from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list with aggregation, join and WHERE-clause

Exasol: SELECT SUM(("T1"."B" + 1)) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B"

testCases.testQuery: select sum(b+1) from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7 group by a,y
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list with aggregation, join and WHERE-clause, GROUP BY

Exasol: SELECT SUM(("T1"."B" + 1)) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B" GROUP BY "T1"."A", "T2"."Y"

testCases.testQuery: select sum(b+1) from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7 group by a,y having sum(x) > 0
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list with aggregation, join and WHERE-clause, GROUP BY, HAVING

Exasol: SELECT SUM(("T1"."B" + 1)) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B" GROUP BY "T1"."A", "T2"."Y" HAVING 0 < SUM("T2"."X")

testCases.testQuery: select sum(b+1) from vs.t1 join vs.t2 on a=x where t1.b>7 group by a,y having sum(x) > 0 order by sum(y+1) limit 3 offset 1
testCases.testDescription: Full pushdown with select-list with aggregation, join and WHERE-clause, GROUP BY, HAVING, ORDER BY and LIMIT

Exasol: SELECT SUM(("T1"."B" + 1)) FROM "LS"."T1" INNER JOIN "LS"."T2" ON "T1"."A" = "T2"."X" WHERE 7 < "T1"."B" GROUP BY "T1"."A", "T2"."Y" HAVING 0 < SUM("T2"."X") ORDER BY SUM(("T2"."Y" + 1)) LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1
